title: PMS 2.0 587 - Evan McPherson, Erin Andrews, Bobby Lashley, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about all the fallout from yesterday's Aaron Rodgers Tuesday conversation, what they think is potentially going to happen with him in the coming weeks, if AJ has heard anything, and much more as we zero in on Conference Championship weekend. Joining the program fresh off a game winning kick in Tennessee to beat the Titans and send the Bengals to the AFC Championship, rookie Kicker for the Bengals, Evan McPherson. Pat and Evan chat about his mentality when it comes to making kicks, what he allegedly told backup QB Brandon Allen before the game winning kick, his relationship with Joe Burrow, and how he gets better moving forward (13:26-28:44). Next, sideline reporter for FOX, co-host of the Calm Down podcast, friend of the progrum, Erin Andrews joins the show to chat about this season as a whole, her thoughts on where Rodgers and Tom Brady will end up, what she's learned about the four remaining teams from her work this year, what's next for the podcast, and much more (31:35-58:29). Later, former WWE World Champion, one of the most fit men on the planet, Bobby Lashley joins the show ahead of his massive tilt with Brock Lesnar this weekend at the Royal Rumble, his career path thus far, when he decided he wanted to become a professional wrestler, what his future looks like, his workout regimen, and much more (59:38-1:25:50). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
